mission.title: Built By Devs, For Devs
mission.content: We're indie developers who were frustrated with bloated, overpriced SEO tools. So we engineered something better: a lean, powerful keyword research tool that respects your time and budget.

team.title: Current Status
team.content: Now in beta, laser-focused on serving indie developers and bootstrapped startups. We're constantly iterating based on real developer feedback.

quality.title: Ruthless Simplicity
quality.description: Zero bloat. Zero distractions. Just powerful keyword insights.

innovation.title: True Usage Pricing
innovation.description: Flexible pricing that scales precisely with your needs

userFocus.title: Dev-Centric
userFocus.description: Engineered specifically for technical products and audiences

hero.title: SEO Tools for Independent Developers
hero.subtitle: Discover niche market opportunities, optimize content ranking, and boost website traffic. Pay-as-you-go pricing with full transparency.

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Designed specifically for independent developers to find the best market opportunities

keyword.title: Keyword Analysis
keyword.description: Smart analysis of keyword difficulty and search volume to help you find the perfect niche market

competition.title: Competition Analysis
competition.description: Analyze competitor rankings and content strategies to identify market opportunities

content.title: Content Optimization
content.description: Data-driven recommendations to optimize your website content and improve search rankings

pricing.title: Simple & Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay per result item, no hidden fees

cta.title: Start Using DevSEO
cta.subtitle: Pay-as-you-go pricing, full transparency, start and stop anytime
